Since it was new year and there were so many guest,and traffic in front of the hotel is not moving we waited patiently for our car. After 30 minutes my daughter decided to take the taxi so that she will not be late for work, since our car is not delivered to us. At around 12:30pm, I approached the valet attendant to know the status of our car. He told me that one of staff already went to get it.I notice that the traffic is gone,and my fellow drivers waiting for their car were already gone.At 1 pm I approached again the person in charge of valet parking, but he can not give me a definite answer where and when will they deliver my car. That's the time I raise my voice, asking him " Saan nyo ba pinark ang kotse ko? sa Tagaytay". Immediately he called one of his staff to assist, the staff ran down the basement and "Euraka" in less than 5 minutes my car is in front of me. It was a pleasant stay until that incident involving the valet parking....
